column3: Mebɛma ɔyardɔm kor so aba Farao
column4: nye Egypt do bio; na n’ekyir no ɔbɛma hom efi ha akɔ: aber a ɔbɛma hom akɔ no

column3: na ma ɔbanyin biara mbisa wɔ ne nyɛnko hɔ
column4: na ɔbaa mbisa wɔ ne nyɛnko hɔ

column2: "Na EWURADZE maa ɔman no enyimpa wɔ Egyptfo enyim. Nkyii so nna ɔyɛɛ Moses otsitsir paara wɔ Egypt asaase do

column4: Bɛyɛ esuom na mibefir edzi mafa Egypt mu:"

column2: "na Egypt asaase do mbakan nyinara bowuwu
column3: ofi Farao n’abakan a ɔtsena n’ahengua do do
column4: dze kodu afonabaa mpo a ɔwɔ ewuyambo ekyir n’abakan do; nye ofiembowa mbakan nyinara."

column2: "Na su kɛse bɛba Egypt asaase nyinara do a ne saso bi mbaa da
column3: eso ne saso bi nnkɛba bio."
ɔkraman mpo nnkɔtwe ne tɛkyerɛma ahye hɔn
column4: ɔnnkɛhye nyimpa anaa abowa: ama hom eehu mbrɛ EWURADZE si dze ɔhe to Egyptfo nye Israel ntamu."

column2: "Na wo nkowaa yi nyinara besian aba mo hɔ
column3: na wɔabɔbɔ hɔn mu adze ama me dɛ
column5: ɔwo nye ɔman a wɔka wo do nyinara: na ɔno ekyir no na mibefir edzi makɔ. Na ɔdze ebufuhyew fii Farao nkyɛn kɔree."

column3: Farao nnketsie hom; ama m’anwanwadze aadɔɔ so wɔ Egypt asaase do."

column2: "Na Moses nye Aaron yɛɛ anwanwadze yi nyinara wɔ Farao enyim; na EWURADZE piriim Farao n’akoma
column3: na ɔamma Israelmba emmfi n’asaase do annkɔ."
